title: Seve Ballesteros: the short game
brief_description: Seve Ballesteros is undoubtedly the greatest continental golfer. His remarkable ability to imagine and perform miraculous shots has placed him on a level above the rest. Seve’s easy instructional program is designed to help improve your game from 100 yards and in, enabling you to polish your techniques. Focuses on fundamentals like the grip, stance and alignment, chipping, putting and associated skills to help achieve success in the short game.
